name: Bow Shooter 3D - Training
description:
Bow Shooter 3D - Training: 8 challenging shooting stands, moving targets, 3 bows to choose from, and incredible medieval feel!

Choose from the bows available and learn to shoot like archers do. Use touch zone of the remote control to aim, long-tap to adjust the bent, tap again to shoot. Hit all the targets on the level.

Play alone or unlock 2 players levels. Download Bow Shooter 3D on your phone using QR codes to transform your device into another remote control. Note: both players must be connected to one Wi-Fi network.
